settings.heading_text: Experience The Best In Charcoal Cooking
settings.description_text: Kasai Konro Grills are inspired by World famous japanese design. They are traditional heat source used to make delicious meat, fish and vegetables.Enjoyed by the best restaurants chefs and best users , Kasai is more than a charcoal grill.

Michlein star Head Chef, Tommy Banks Uses Kasai while cooking at home, and in both of his Michlein Star Restaurants.

settings.heading: Key Features
settings.description: Compact, versatile and designed for home use.This Iconic Structure of the kasai uses a special insulating material that reflects heat back into the grill.
